text.*:
Yazoo discography
Cover of debut album Upstairs at Eric's
Studio albums 2
Live albums 1
Compilation albums 4
EPs 2
Singles 9

This is a discography for the 1980s synthpop duo Yazoo. Their debut studio album Upstairs at Eric's achieved platinum status both in the UK and the US.

Yazoo had success during the early part of the decade with two hit studio albums and five hit singles. Since their split in 1983, there has been some commercial success with releases of compilation albums and remixed singles across Europe and the US.

    • 1.1 Studio albums
    • 1.2 Compilation albums
